name: <<  Mason  >>
description: Rules: Mason Blessings should be Material Objects Related to the Ocean & Navigation

name: The Black Pearl
description: Essence Costs of Trader's Abilities cost 1 less

name: Pebble Seive
description: Init: AttuneTo Water. When Anyone Attunes to Water: Reduce Cooldown on all of your moves by 1.

name: Coral Bracer
description: Init: AttuneTo Stone. When Anyone Attunes to Stone: Gain 1 Tough

name: Sundial
description: At End of Turn: If turn is not a prime number: Extend Cooldowns of Enemy by 1.

name: Escape Net
description: Whenever Player move is Banked: 25% chance of ignoring Effect

name: <<  Cultivist >>
description: Rules: Cultivist Blessings should be Organic Matter Related to Plant/Fire

name: Seed of Life-Plant
description: Init: AttuneTo Plant. When Anyone Attunes to Plant: gain 1 energy.

name: Gutteral Ember
description: Player Ignores-Burn. On Damage from Stone or Water: [cooldown 3]

name: Writhing Root
description: At Start of Turn: If Player Turns Attuned to Plant > 5: You can see what move the enemy is about to do.

name: Ashen Skin
description: Init: AttuneTo Fire. When anyone attunes to fire: gain 2 energy/burn dividied at random

name: <<  Nomad  >>
description: Rules: Nomad Blessings should be Modern Foot-Travel Objects or Historical Objects of High Value

name: Copper Anklet
description: Init: AttuneTo Thunder. When Anyone Attunes to Thunder: gain 1 energy.

name: Windcap
description: Init: AttuneTo Force. When Anyone Attunes to Force: gain 1 energy.

name: Static Codex
description: Player may ignore the effects of the first Bound Move each round.

name: Famine Ledger
description: On Start of Each Turn: Players each gain 1 turn of a random status.

name: <<  Bastard  >>
description: Rules: Bastard Blessings should be either Items for Ritual Violence or Repurposed Flesh

name: Ceremonial Dagger
description: When 'Open-Wounds' Triggers: set HP to MaxHP

name: Bloodshot Eye
description: Init: AttuneTo Vital. When Anyone Attunes to Vital: Gain IgnoreSleep

name: Mason's Scalp
description: At start of match: if Enemy is Mason: Apply 1 Stun to Enemy.

name: Cultivist's Scalp
description: At start of match: if Enemy is Cultivist: Apply 1 Stun to Enemy.

name: Nomad's Scalp
description: At start of match: if Enemy is Nomad: Apply 1 Stun to Enemy.
At start of match: Target Player Attunes to Water
At start of match: Change the Element of any move to an Element of your Choice
On TickStatus: If Status Turns Left == 0: Reduce Any Status 1 Turn [cooldown 1]
On Bank Move: If MoveType == Utility: Gain 1 Energy
On DealDamage: If DamageElement == Water: Target Loses all Status Effects [Cooldown 3]
On TickAttunements: If Attuned to > 2 Elements: Thaw One Move [cooldown 1]
On Use Shop Ability "Research": Find 1 Additional Upgrade Option
On Calculate Damage: Base Damage += X where X is number of banked moves of Shared Element.
Start of Turn: Gain 1 Tough. [Charge 3]

name: non-newtonian
description: On Hurt: If Self has Tough: Gain 1 Tough
On Match Start: Enemy Random Active Action Move == Slow
On UnbankMove: If only one move has been unbanked this turn: Unbank any move
On AttuneTo: If Turn Number > 5 and Element == Stone: Apply 2 Slow to Target
On Hurt: If Target.AttunedTo != Stone: Deal 1 Stone Damage to Target
On ExecuteTurn: If Turn Number == 4 or 8 or 16: Iters += 1 / 2 / 4
On ApplyStatus Burn: If self has burn: Reduce Self Burn 1.
On Hurt: If Damage > 2: Apply 1 Burn to Attacker
On Match Start: Apply 1 Burn to Target
On Set Random Value: Random Value += 1
When Anyone Gains Burn: Apply 1 Sleep to Burnt Entity. [Cooldown Permanent]
On Cooldown Applied/Extended on Self Move: 50% Chance of Thaw 1 Turn
On Use Shop Ability 'Kindle': Gain 2 Essence.
On StartTurn: if Self has Burn: Apply 1 Burn to all Enemies.
On Overheat: Negate all Bound Moves. Negate All Cooldown on your Moves.
On NegateAttune: Apply IgnoreAttune to Target. [cooldown permanent]
On Heal: Heal += 1 [Cooldown 1]
On Match Start: Apply 3 Regen to Self
On Enemy Attunement is Negated: Attune to Negated Element (Optional)
On DealDamage: If Damage is Plant and Target is not Attuned to Plant: Attune Target to Plant
On AttuneTo: If Element==Water: Lose Attunement to Water and Apply 1 Strong
On Match Start: X = Declare Element. On Entity AttunesTo X: Deals Y Damage where Y == Current Turn
On DealDamage: Heal X where X == Damage Dealt. [Cooldown Infinite]
On ApplyStatus: if Status == Wound: Turns += 1
On Match Start: Take 3 Damage. MaxHP += 3
On Trigger Blessing: You may Ignore Blessing Effect. If you do: Gain 1 Energy.
OpenWounds Deals Damage to All Players
On Turn Start: If Self Not Strong: Apply 1 Strong to Self
On Skipped Turn: Gain 2 Strong.
On DealDamage: If Attuned to Vital and No Other Element: Base Damage += 2
On TurnStart: X = RandVal(2-6). If X <= Self.Energy: Spend all Energy. This Turn Your Attacks Deal Double Damage
Start of Match: Gain 1 Turn of Random Status Effect.
On PrivatizeMove: Reprivatized Moves you have Seen Before are Marked as 'Seen'
While Cursed: On DealDamage: Apply 1 CurseChance to Target
On ApplyStatus: If Status is not Sleep/Stun/Anger: Apply 1 Additional Turn of Status. [cooldown 2]
On Use Shop Ability "Recover": You may Reroll the Recovered Blessing 1 Time
Start of Match: If Self has fewer moves than Opponent: Fill slot with a Copy of a Random Move Opp has.
While Cursed: Immune to Status Effects other than Curse.
On GainStatus Quick: Negate self Status Stun. [Cooldown Permanent]
On Match Start: One Random Active Move Speed == Quick
On Hurt: If Damage Element == Thunder: Deal 2 Thunder Damage to Attacker.
All Moves are QuickMoves. On Skip Turn: [Cooldown Permanent]
On Spend Energy: If Overspend: Gain Overspent Energy Back
On DealDamage: If Turn Number == fibonacci Value: Base += sequence interval (1 = 1; 3 = 2; 5 = 3; 8 = 4; etc.)
At Match Start: X = Private RandVal(1-5). On Hurt: If CalculatedDamage == X: Deal X Thunder DMG to Attacker

name: Punish Diversity
description: On DealDamage: If Self Elements AttunedTo < Target Elements AttunedTo: Deal += Delta
On ApplyCooldown: Deal X Water Damage to Target where X == # of Self Moves on Cooldown
While Self AttunedTo > 4 Elements: Ignore Non-Water Damage
While Slow: You may Cast Moves from Bank as if they were Active
On ExecuteOp: If MoveElement is Stone and MoveType is Attack: 'Base' and 'Times' Swap Values
On Opponent ExecuteTurn: If Self has Slow: You may Copy Opponent's Move til end of Match. If you do push one move to Bank and Create a copy of it. [cooldown Permanent]
While Anger: Immune to Sleep and Stun.
On DeclareVariable: Make 2 Declarations- Both Values Apply.
While Anger: Player Ignores Sleep and may cast moves on cooldown as if they were not on Cooldown.
On GainStatus that is not Regen: If Self has Regen: Gain 1 Regen
On Hurt: If Damage ELement was not Fire/Vital: Deal 1 Damage to Attacker [Charges: 3]
On Enemy Heal: If Self has Burn: Heal X where X == Enemy's Heal Value
On UnbindMove: Declare Non-Public Move: Bind Declared Move.
On PlayerDeath: If Self has Wounds or Died from Wounds: Remove All Wounds then Set HP to 1. [Cooldown Permanent]

name: blood brothers
description: On DealDamage: If Player.Culture == Bastard: Apply 1 Wound
On DealDamage: If DamageElement == Vital: Trigger OpenWounds.
On Apply Wound: X = RandVal(1-10). If X < Self.Wound: Apply Wound. Repeat up to 3 times
On Match Start: Peek at up to 2 Private Moves
On TickDecay: After Apply CurseChance: Gain Immune to Decay til end of Turn.
On Weather Event: Negate All Damage Until Next Turn.
On PlayerDeath: Heal HP to MaxHP Negate All Status Effects Negate All Attunements. Discard this Blessing.
While Sleep: Immune to Non-Status Damage
On ExecuteTurn: If self has Quick: Gain 1 Energy.
On MakeDeclaration: If self Has Quick: You may see Opponent's Move Choice.
On DealDamage: Damage is Dealt to All Players. On ExecuteTurn: Times += 2
Init: X == 0. On Apply Burn: X += 1 then Deals X Fire Damage to all Players.
While Cursed: You may Cast Moves on Cooldown as if they were not on cooldown.
